## Setting up the linear moderation model

```{r}
mod.model <- lm(Exhaustion ~ 1 + Structure + Control + Structure*Control, data=employee)
summary(mod.model)
```

## Probing the moderation: Pick a point

```{r}
pickapoint(mod.model, dv='Exhaustion', iv='Structure', mod='Control')
```

## Probing the moderation: Johnson-Neyman

```{r}
jn <- jn(mod.model, dv='Exhaustion', iv='Structure', mod='Control')
jn
plot(jn, axlwd = 1, celwd = 1, cblwd = 1)
```


```{r}
modplot(mod.model, predictor = "Structure", moderator = "Control", alpha = .05, jn = T) 
```
